name: 李仕宇
objective: To know the programming tools and numerical methods for nonlinear systems.
schedule:
Introduction of Numerical methods 
Introduction of Programming Tool for Numerical methods 
Training Stage I－Introduction of Environment
Training Stage II－Fundamental Know-How
Training Stage III－Practices
Introduction & Practice Step by Step
Analysis & Practice Step by Step
Midterm
Final exam
scorePolicy:
Hw Report & Presentation (Full English, 1 Hw 1 week)：40 %
Final Evaluations (Full English)：60 % 　

Office Hours: 
Wednesday    15:00-17:00  
Thursday    15:00-17:00  
Integrate Technology Complex, Room 714-3

covid19.courseScoreMethod: According to the policy of our University to COVID-19, the midterm report should be e-file, and the final full-English presentation should be held on-line.

covid19.additionalInfo:
因應本校防疫措施：
(一)疫情警戒第一級或以下時，以實體授課為原則；
(二)疫情警戒第二級時，課程原則將採取遠距上課或分流上課方式進行；
(三)疫情警戒第三級或以上時，全校課程採遠距教學授課，學生以不到校為原則；
